extension.name: Ultimate Facebook Comments
extension.author: Stergios Zgouletas
extension.description: This module loads the Facebook Comments into a Joomla 1.5/1.6/1.7/2.5/3.x site [http://www.web-expert.gr].

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of module for individual styling.

field.name: numcomm
field.label: Number of Comments
field.description: Number of Comments you want to show on first page

field.name: width
field.label: Width px
field.description: Width at of comments in pixels

field.name: writecomment
field.label: Display Write a Comment
field.description: Display above comment box write a comment

field.name: totalcomments
field.label: Display Total Comments
field.description: Display above comment box the total comments

field.name: scheme
field.label: Scheme Color
field.description: New Layout not has custom css but has 2 color themes

field.name: seoboost
field.label: Enable SeoBoost
field.description: Renders the comments to html source

field.name: seoboostcache
field.label: SeoBoost Cache (sec)
field.description: Caches the facebook data for faster loading.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
